name: 09 - LaunchAirways Chatbot (AI Models)
description: This feature flag will change AI models in real-time for the LaunchAirways Chatbotcomponent in LaunchAirways.

variations.name: Claude Haiku
variations.description: This is Claude Haiku's AI model for quick response and cost saving

variations.name: Meta Llama
variations.description: This is Meta's Llama AI model for more creative responses

variations.name: Cohere Coral
variations.description: This is Cohere Coral AI model for balance between precision and creativity
